ModMetaData.name: Mechanical Defence 2
ModMetaData.author: mipen
ModMetaData.description:
Mechanical Defence 2 aims to beef up your colony with new and exciting technologies!
Current features include: -> Droids - Build mechanical slaves to help out around the colony -> Mechanical walls - Walls that can extend or retract, or become an embrasure at your leisure -> Automatic Miner - A large machine which digs ores from the ground
